sourcesContent: import { MdAccessTime } from "react-icons/md"; import { TiArrowRightThick } from "react-icons/ti"; import './ArticleItem.css' import 'src/assets/fonts/AlfaSlabOne.ttf' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; function ArticleItem(){ return( The Title of the first article Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content. The rest of the article writer : Maedeh 5 min ) } export default ArticleItem;
